metadata.title: RHSA-2020:3199: openstack-tripleo-heat-templates security update (Important)
metadata.description:
openstack-tripleo-heat-templates is a collection of OpenStack Orchestration
templates and tools (codename heat), which can be used to help deploy
OpenStack.

Security Fix(es):

* EMBARGOED CVE-2020-10731 openstack-tripleo-heat-templates: No sVirt
protection for OSP16 VMs due to disabled SELinux (CVE-2020-10731)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS
score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE
page listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: openstack-tripleo-heat-templates: No sVirt protection for OSP16 VMs due to disabled SELinux

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
openstack-tripleo-heat-templates is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
